DOC.brief_title: Avoiding Hippocampus During Whole-Brain Radiation Therapy Treating Patients With Brain Metastases
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Evaluate delay recall assess Hopkins Verbal Learning Test-Revised ( HVTL-R ) 4 month hippocampal avoidance whole-brain radiotherapy ( HA-WBRT ) patient brain metastasis . Secondary - Evaluate auditory visual learning memory , assess 2 CogState test ( International Shopping List Test One Card Learning Test ) , HA-WBRT patient . - Compare psychometric property 2 CogState test HVLT-R assessment memory decline HA-WBRT patient . - Evaluate health-related quality life [ assess Functional Assessment Cancer Therapy Brain Subscale ( FACT-BR ) Barthel Index Activities Daily Living ( ADLs ) ] HA-WBRT patient . - Evaluate time radiographic progression HA-WBRT patient . - Evaluate overall survival patient HA-WBR . - Evaluate adverse event HA-WBR . - Evaluate predictive biomarkers cognitive function . OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients undergo 10 fraction intensity-modulated whole-brain radiotherapy ( WBRT ) , avoid hippocampal ( HA ) region , daily , 5 day week , 2-2½ week . Patients neurocognitive function ( delay recall , auditory visual learning , memory ) evaluate Hopkins Verbal Learning Test-Revised ( HVTL-R ) , The One Card Learning Test ( OCLT ) , International Shopping List Test ( ISLT ) baseline periodically study . Patients may undergo serum , plasma , whole blood collection baseline 4 month completion HA-WBRT correlative study . Patients may complete Functional Assessment Cancer Therapy Brain Subscale ( FACT-BR ) , Barthel Index Activities Daily Living ( ADLs ) quality-of-life questionnaire baseline periodically study follow . After completion study therapy , patient follow periodically .
